text: Safety is an extended play album by English band Coldplay. It was the band's first public release. It was recorded over a weekend during May 1998, and was intended as a demo for record companies. It was financed by the band and their manager Phil Harvey for around £200. == Track List == #"Bigger Stronger" – 4:49 #"No More Keeping My Feet on the Ground" – 4:31 #"Such a Rush" – 4:57 Category:Coldplay Category:1998 albums
title: Safety (EP)
